price: Nayo uwuzogenza umugongo mu kwirengagiza uburongozi bwanje, mu vy’ukuri azobaho ubuzima bw’ivyago n’amaganya kw’isi[399], Duheze Tumuzure ku musi w’izuka ari impumyi kuko yirengagije kubona ukuri kw’ivyemezo vyacu akiri kw’isi”;
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَن ذِكۡرِي فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةٗ ضَنكٗا وَنَحۡشُرُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ
footnotes: [399] N’aho umuraba wogira ngo abayeho yorohewe, ahimbawe.

meta.transliteration: waman aʿraḍa ʿan dhik'rī fa-inna lahu maʿīshatan ḍankan wanaḥshuruhu yawma al-qiyāmati aʿmā
